children.fields: Please first fill in the mandatory fields!

contact.feedback: If you just want to give us a quick feedback. It would really help if you could check out this
contact.reachOut: If you want to reach out to one of us just send an e-mail to one of the following adresses:

howto.addButton: now click the "add" button and the person will get added into your tree
howto.addPerson: Add a person to a tree?
howto.chooseJson: if you want to save the famitry in your local storage to import it again choose .json file
howto.choosePng: if you just like to have a picture of your famitry in your local storage choose the .png file
howto.continue: if you want to continue adding persons simply check the "Add more" option
howto.createButton: now click the "create" button and you will get to your tree
howto.delPerson: to delete the person just press the "remove person" button
howto.doubleClick: double click one of your created persons
howto.drag&drop: you can also drag&drop to get to your wished position
howto.files: you can choose between .png file or .json file
howto.fillOut: and fill out at least the required fields marked with a *
howto.middleTree: button you can always get to the middle of your tree
howto.nameAndDelTrees: button and name the tree as you like or delete it by pressing on
howto.nameTrees: button and name the tree as you like
howto.navigateToTrees: navigate to one of your trees
howto.nowAgain: the tree is now in "my trees" again
howto.propertys: now you can see all propertys of the person, just edit them and press the "update" button to save your changes
howto.selectJson: now select one .json file from your local storage
howto.text1: We have started building famitry back in early 2021 as a small project. But soon it grew bigger and everyone started to put work into it. As we sat together to clarify our aims everyone should say one quality of the website which is the most important to him. That's where our vision for this project was settled. Simple, fast, free and stylish are the four words which should always describe this website. We all hope that you have the experience we want to deliver. So if you come across any problems using this website feel free to
howto.text2: You can also find quick help on how to use the tree editor
howto.title: The Vision
howto.zoom: or just use the scroll wheel on your mouse to zoom in or out of the tree
